job_description: SAMSUNG IS THE FUTURE… JOIN US!Do you believe in the power of technology to help shape a brighter future and a stronger global community? Are you inspired by the possibilities? Are innovation, camaraderie, and the pursuit of excellence part of your innate drive? Then you've got what it takes to succeed at Samsung.Samsung is making big steps into enterprise mobility with a wide range of device and SW solutions. With the recent launch of Samsung KNOX™, we are now looking for experienced and talented individuals for our Vancouver lab to design, develop, operate and support these new solutions in the global market. Location:Burnaby, British ColumbiaJunior Support Engineer (Co-Op)Samsung is looking for an enthusiastic engineering/computer science co-op student to join the Samsung Customer Support team.  The successful candidate will use superior sleuthing skills and extra levels of empathy to support Samsung KNOX customers and solution partners for the KNOX product line.  Support issues range from KNOX product configuration to API support.
job_requirements: Responsibilities:Develop enterprise Android apps using the KNOX SDK to reproduce solution partner issues.Troubleshoot enterprise Android apps and provide technical resolutions as needed to either internal teams or to external customers.Reconfigure and troubleshoot enterprise IT environments as directed.Document best practices and update knowledge base for customers. QualificationsPursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering.Proficient in Java, C/C++ programming; Android/Mobile experience is an asset.Ability to work in a team environment.Excellent proficiency in oral and written English.Attention to detail and a commitment to quality.Must demonstrate a strong trait of technology focused curiosity.Demonstrated multi-tasking and organizational skills in a rapidly changing environment.Strong interest in mobile technology.  Samsung is an equal employment opportunity employer.  We thank you for your interest in working for Samsung, only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.Open To All Majors:No
